item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, May 20, 2025 at 1:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Have I Been Pwned 2.0 (277 points | 85 comments)
2. is-even-ai – Check if a number is even using the power of AI (53 points | 14 comments)
3. The Windows Subsystem for Linux is now open source (1049 points | 680 comments)
4. Jules: An Asynchronous Coding Agent (180 points | 84 comments)
5. Zod 4 (576 points | 180 comments)
6. GitHub Copilot Coding Agent (316 points | 189 comments)
7. Claude Code SDK (251 points | 112 comments)
8. Launch HN: Better Auth (YC X25) – Authentication Framework for TypeScript (169 points | 63 comments)
9. Run your GitHub Actions locally (155 points | 64 comments)
10. Kilo: A text editor in less than 1000 LOC with syntax highlight and search (45 points | 4 comments)
11. Terraform MCP Server (17 points | 4 comments)
12. The forbidden railway: Vienna-Pyongyang (2008) (125 points | 27 comments)
13. Microbes in Gowanus teach lessons on fighting industrial pollution (7 points | discuss)
14. Game theory illustrated by an animated cartoon game (192 points | 33 comments)
15. DDoSecrets publishes 410 GB of heap dumps, hacked from TeleMessage (5 points | discuss)
16. Remarks on AI from NZ (116 points | 65 comments)
17. xAI's Grok 3 comes to Microsoft Azure (84 points | 88 comments)
18. Too Much Go Misdirection (143 points | 62 comments)
19. Self-Hosting Moose with Docker Compose, Redis, Temporal, Redpanda and ClickHouse (19 points | 5 comments)
20. Patience too cheap to meter (4 points | 1 comment)
21. Dominion Energy's NEM 2.0 Proposal: What It Means for Solar in Virginia (43 points | 38 comments)
22. WireGuard-vanity-keygen: WireGuard vanity key generator (41 points | 5 comments)
23. Glasskube (YC S24) is hiring in Vienna to build Open Source deployment tools ( | hide)
24. ClawPDF – Open-Source Virtual/Network PDF Printer with OCR and Image Support (170 points | 23 comments)
25. Don't Use ISO/IEC 14977:1996 Extended Backus-Naur Form (EBNF) (2023) (22 points | 10 comments)
26. The truth behind the accuracy of weather forecasts (29 points | 14 comments)
27. Show HN: A MCP server to evaluate Python code in WASM VM using RustPython (18 points | 9 comments)
28. Dilbert creator Scott Adams says he will die soon from same cancer as Joe Biden (252 points | 277 comments)
29. Microsoft's ICC blockade: digital dependence comes at a cost (220 points | 110 comments)
30. Show HN: Windows 98 themed website in 1 HTML file for my post punk band (159 points | 33 comments)
